snippet: Video posted online by activists in Egypt offered clear evidence that the assailants who attacked a sit-in in Cairo this week, killing at least 11 people, were armed.
abstract: Video posted online by activists in Egypt offered clear evidence that the assailants who attacked a sit-in in Cairo this week, killing at least 11 people, were armed.

headline.main: Video Shows Cairo Protesters Were Attacked by Armed Assailants
